Package com.example.matata

Class EventAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventAdapter.EventViewHolder>
com.example.matata.EventAdapter
public class EventAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventAdapter.EventViewHolder>
EventAdapter is a RecyclerView adapter that binds a list of Event objects to views displayed in a RecyclerView. Each Event is displayed in an item layout defined by event_card.xml, and clicking on an event item opens the ViewEvent activity to display detailed information about the selected event. Outstanding issues: Currently, the adapter only displays a truncated version of the event description if it exceeds 100 characters. Additional customization might be required to dynamically adjust this limit or expand the text based on user interaction.

    • EventAdapter

      public EventAdapter(android.content.Context context, List<Event> eventList, List<String> status, Map<String,String> posterUrls)
      Constructs an EventAdapter with a specified context, list of events, and list of statuses.
      Parameters:
      context - the context in which the RecyclerView is being used
      eventList - the list of Event objects to display in the RecyclerView
      status - the list of event statuses corresponding to each event in the eventList
